rows.label: qst200716_0010
rows.name:
Mo mo! This is incredible
mushroom! Where friends get it?

rows.label: qst200716_0020
rows.name:
Is dried-up mushroom
really that incredible?

rows.label: qst200716_0030
rows.name:
This is Bloomshroom! Make it
splishy-sploshy and it get real big!

rows.label: qst200716_0040
rows.name:
They go extinct more than
century ago. Everybody say
they gone for good.

rows.label: qst200716_0050
rows.name:
Pekkopeko never thought he see
real Bloomshroom with his own
eyes! It dream come true!

rows.label: qst200716_0060
rows.name: So how big is that?

rows.label: qst200716_0070
rows.name:
Mo mo! What is easiest way to
put this...? Infinitely big!

rows.label: qst200716_0080
rows.name:
You mean...an all-you-can-eat
mushroom? You gotta cook
it up right away!

rows.label: qst200716_0090
rows.name:
And we have to treat everyone!
IT'S A MUSHROOM PARTYYY!

rows.label: qst200716_0100
rows.name: Heheh! Pekkopeko will get cooking!

rows.label: qst200716_0110
rows.name: Idaten so cool!

rows.label: qst200716_0120
rows.name: Idaten so dreamy!

rows.label: qst200716_0130
rows.name:
Idaten! We will call
this burgle-off a draw!

rows.label: qst200716_0140
rows.name:
It feels good to sit and eat
surrounded by Nopon friends.

rows.label: qst200716_0150
rows.name:
Naturally, Yumyum will graciously
return all stolen foods.

rows.label: qst200716_0160
rows.name:
So next time, we can decide fairly
who the greatest burglar is!

rows.label: qst200716_0170
rows.name:
And we will finally see who is number
one in Nopon hearts and minds!

rows.label: qst200716_0180
rows.name: Hey, you... You listening?!

rows.label: qst200716_0190
rows.name:
Don't you ever stop talking? It's
time to eat, not time to talk!

rows.label: qst200716_0200
rows.name: Mo mooooo!
